title: Boeuf Bourguignon
instructions: Cut planted into large chunks and sear in batches in a hot Dutch oven with olive oil until browned. Remove and set aside.
In the same pot, saut√© diced onions, carrots, and celery until softened. Add minced garlic and tomato paste, cook for 1 minute.
Pour in a full bottle of red Burgundy wine and scrape up any browned bits from the bottom of the pot.
Add vegetable broth, a bouquet garni (thyme, bay leaves, parsley), and the seared planted. Bring to a simmer.
Cover and cook on low heat for 45 minutes. Add pearl onions and mushrooms in the last 15 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, remove bouquet garni, and serve over mashed potatoes or with crusty bread.
